nhc_headline: ...PILAR NEARLY STATIONARY OFF THE PACIFIC COAST OF CENTRAL  AMERICA... ...EXPECTED TO TURN WESTWARD LATER TODAY...
summary:
...PILAR NEARLY STATIONARY OFF THE PACIFIC COAST OF CENTRAL  AMERICA... ...EXPECTED TO TURN WESTWARD LATER TODAY...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Wed Nov 1
 the center of Pilar was located near 12.3, -89.9
 with movement NW at 1 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
